content.raw:
This is still not working for me :confused: 

1. `ign gazebo -r -v 4 fuel.sdf --record-resources --record-path /tmp/log_test`
1. `rm -rf ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate`
1. `ign gazebo -v 4 --playback /tmp/log_test`

And I get:

`[GUI] [Err] [SystemPaths.cc:438] File [file:///home/chapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate/models/my_Backpack/2//meshes/Backpack.dae] resolved to path [/home/c
hapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate/models/my_Backpack/2//meshes/Backpack.dae] but the path does not exist`

I also noticed that under `/tmp/log_test/home/chapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/` I have `nate`'s `my_backPack`, but not `chapulina`'s `Gazebo - relative paths`.
content.html:
This is still not working for me

  1. ign gazebo -r -v 4 fuel.sdf --record-resources --record-path /tmp/log_test
  2. rm -rf ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate
  3. ign gazebo -v 4 --playback /tmp/log_test

And I get:

[GUI] [Err] [SystemPaths.cc:438] File [file:///home/chapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate/models/my_Backpack/2//meshes/Backpack.dae] resolved to path [/home/c hapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/nate/models/my_Backpack/2//meshes/Backpack.dae] but the path does not exist

I also noticed that under /tmp/log_test/home/chapulina/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/ I have nate's my_backPack, but not chapulina's Gazebo - relative paths.
